moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Nc3: 3 Knights Game. I have been playing this quite a bit lately but i think I am ready to try more aggressive openings. Although I do like how center is covered and the bishops haven't been committed yet.
moves.3... Bc5 4. Bc4: Here I could have played 4.Nxe5 Nxe5 5.e4
moves.4... h6 5. O-O Nge7 6. d3 a6 7. a3: I played 7.a3 to lead up to 8.d4 but I don't like the way 8.d4 separates the pawns. I think 7.Be3 would have been better.
moves.7... O-O 8. b4 Ba7 9. Nd5: I have a big space advantage right now, but can I hold it?
moves.9... d6 10. c3: am I entombing my pieces or supporting them?
moves.10... Kh8 11. Be3 f5 12. Bxa7: bad move! black bishop sitting on a7 limited where his N could move to. Now black can move his N without wasting a move and open up c6 so I can be driven back.
moves.13... Nxd5 14. Bxd5: I think 14.Nf7+ Rxf7 15.Bxd5 would have been better
moves.15. Qf3: I wonder if 15.exf5 Rxf5 16. f3 would have been better?
moves.15... f4 16. g3: I don't like this move but I'm not sure what else would have been better. Maybe Rfd1?
moves.16... Bh3 17. Bxb7: I should have played Rfd1 here
moves.17... fxg3 18. Qxg3 Qxg3+ 19. hxg3 Rab8: I should have played Kg2 or d4
moves.23... Rbf8 24. Kg2 h5 25. Rh1: if I had played d4 I would have the help of my bishop right now. I don't know what the best move is here, definitly not Rh1 but maybe gxh5
moves.35... cxb6 36. axb6 Rdb1 37. Bg2: I didn't think throught this one
